title: Serious Sam Tormental
description: Deep into an abandoned temple of Egypt lies a cursed artifact, an ancient device capable of the unthinkable; Could this be the key to entering the mind of the god of destruction: Mental? This may be your only chance to delve deep into the twisted world of its mind, where [Sam]’s quest will lead him against reckless hordes of monsters product of Mental’s wicked imagination. Blast your way through the most hideous corners of its mind, and prepare for a brain-melting showdown

system_requirements.Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4130 @ 3.40 GHz / AMD FX-3650 @ 3.50 GHz
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 610 VRAM (2GB) or Radeon HD 5970
